Error: Media Properties Missing The media properties are not stored in the current database
You probably want to run the "generateFileData" script first. Reload Media Root
Share To share {1} just copy the link below.
Remember that who will receive the link must first be enabled by the administrator.
{2}
Comments Add Comment No comments yet!
Share link Download
To correctly download the file, right click this link and choose "Save As".
After the download is started, click Ok to close the player and cancel the streaming,
or Close to keep playing the file in Pandorica Player.

English Italiano <message id=".combo">Browser Default
Internal (Lighttpd) Nginx
Download Source Nginx could be faster in some environments, but it might not always work
Player HTML5 based players (particulary MediaElement.JS and Video.js) are the most feature complete; jPlayer might be a bit more stable, but it lacks subtitles support

You need to verify your email address before logging in.
Please check you inbox.
${refresh} Your user needs to be authorized first.
The administrator should already have received an email and will add you when possible.
${refresh}
Hello {1},
Thank you for joining my Pandorica Streaming Application!
To complete your registration, please confirm your account by clicking on the following link or copying the URL into your browser: {3}
Hello {1},
Thank you for joining my Pandorica Streaming Application!
To complete your registration, please confirm your account by clicking on the following link or copying the URL into your browser.
Please click here to confirm your registration or copy and paste the following URL into your browser:
{3}
Pandorica Media Player Hello! You are receiving this message because you were invited to use Pandorica Media Player! You can login right now by clicking this URL: {1}. If you think you received this message by error, please just ignore it. Enjoy Pandorica!
Hello! You are receiving this message because you were invited to use Pandorica Media Player! You can login right now by clicking this link. If you think you received this message by error, please just ignore it. Enjoy Pandorica!
Pandorica: unauthorized user login The user {1} ({2}) just tried to login. Since it doesn't appear to be in the authorized users list, it needs to be moderated. Visit {3} to do it. Pandorica: new admin added The user {1} ({2}) was just added to the administrators list. Deploy Type Internal Static Folder Lighttpd Secure Download Nginx Secure Link Secure Link - Secure Download Password Save Deploy directory Deploy path for "{1}" None. Click a directory to set it. Cache Path: Cache Deploy Path Select Media Directories Cache Settings Use cache for subtitles and media previews Wt Internal Deploy Creates a new Wt::WResource to provide data streaming.
Works in every environment, but it's a bit slower. Static Deploy Use a static directories to serve files.
You have to configure this directories in your web server.
If you use Wt whttpd, read this configuration
For other webservers (Apache, Lighttpd, Ngnix) read the proper documentation.
Lighttpd Secure Download Similar to "Static Deploy", performing the same, but also offers some protection against unsecure downloads.
Read More. Nginx Secure Link Exactly as "Lighttpd Secure Download".
Read more.
Cache Deploy Path The selected folder needs to be deployed in your webserver. Configure it, and specify here where.
If empty, a Wt::WResource will be used instead (a bit slower, but still faster than without cache). It looks like your Media Collection is empty.
You can configure it by clicking the "Admin" menu, then choosing "Configure App". Empty Media Collection No Image Small Medium Large Full Go to Parent Directory Close Information Folder Actions Add to Playlist Add to Playlist (recursive)
